name: Hangry Hangry Haplotaxids
description:
Race your wormy friends to gobble up the most veggies!

Play 2 players on keyboard (P1: WASD + SPACE boosts // P2: ARROW KEYS + RSHIFT boosts)
Play up to 5 players with game controllers (left stick moves, A button boosts)

--

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 by:

*Autumn Rizzo*
*Janice + Joel McDonald + kids*
